text: Glen or Glenda is a 1953 movie about a male transvestite .It was written and directed by Ed Wood .It stars Ed Wood as Glen and Glenda , and features Bela Lugosi and Wood 's then - girlfriend Dolores Fuller .This was the only movie Wood directed but did not also produce .Wood himself played the title character , but under the pseudonym " Daniel Davis " .[ 2 ] Lugosi is credited as " The Scientist " .He acts as a sort of narrator but gives no narration relevant to the plot .
